script: Hey [Name], I know we chatted about this a while ago and the timing wasn’t quite right. Totally understand! Just wanted to see if now might be a better time to take a fresh look? No pressure either way, just thought I’d check in 😊

Hey [Name], thanks again for liking my recent post. It’s always appreciated! Out of interest, have you ever looked into how the partner side of what I do actually works? It’s helping a lot of people earn something on the side (or escape the 9–5!). If you’re ever curious, I can show you the short version.

Hey [Name], how’s everything going since training? I know it can sometimes feel like a lot at first, but I promise it gets easier once you start having a few conversations. Want to book a quick catch-up to plan your next steps together?

Hi [Name], I know you were looking at ways to save on your bills and simplify everything. Just wanted to check if you had any questions I could help with, or if you wanted to go ahead? The process is really simple and takes less than 10 minutes to run through properly.
Hey [Name], just thought I’d let you know there’s a new offer that might be perfect for you – especially based on what we chatted about before. Want me to send you a quick summary?
